item.description:
There is an old spiritual adage: “When the student is ready, the teacher will appear.” In today’s “new age,” there are many who are called “spiritual teachers.” How can you determine their integrity, or whether they are the right teacher for you? A real spiritual teacher is able to bring you into a direct experience of the God-Self within. Such teachers can see the next step on your personal spiritual journey, because they have traveled the path before you. In this seminar, we will discuss the key ingredients of what makes a teacher a teacher and how to find the right one for you.

Suggested Donation $35 (light lunch included)


 

Kirtan and Blessing

Experience kirtan (devotional chanting and singing) with a Christian Master and receive the blessings that flow through him, as a channel for Divine Grace. This will happen throughout the week end.

Be prepared to be surprised and moved, and receive Divine Love and blessings.

About Father Peter

Father Peter has been teaching students the inner mysteries of Christianity as a priest and Master Teacher for 30 years. His disciples in the Order of Christ Sophia, which he founded with Mother Clare Watts in 1999, currently operate Centers of Light in 11 U.S. cities. Through his teaching and love, hearts and minds are awakened, opened, and transformed into the shining expressions of God they truly are. Find out more at FatherPeterBowes.com.
item.name: Finding the Right Spiritual Teacher for You
